title: Cosmetic Cream Jar with Screw Lid Realistic Glass Container
description: High-quality realistic cosmetic cream jar 3D model designed for product visualization, branding mockups, and e-commerce renders. The model features accurate proportions, clean topology, and realistic materials suitable for close-up renders. It includes detailed screw threads, subtle edge bevels, and a clean label area, making it ideal for skincare, beauty, and cosmetic product presentations. All materials are neutral and ready for customization, allowing easy re-branding for creams, balms, gels, or masks. Optimized for both still renders and animations, this asset works well in marketing visuals, packaging design previews, and motion graphics.
